post.text: When Trump trivializes the sacrifice of our military and veterans, he makes it clear: He has no idea what service to this country means.

comment.author: Zachary
comment.text: When some of those who criticize here, enrolls in the military and go to the battlefront to defend this country, only means that all we veterans are angry with that idiot Trump, only there will understand us ...

replies.author: Brandon
replies.text: There are military leaders that don't back Clinton.
